snippet.title: Hidden Through Time 2: Myths & Magic | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Hidden Through Time 2: Myths & Magic is AVAILABLE NOW on Steam and GOG!

Immerse yourself in a journey through time and mythology as you uncover hidden treasures and solve intricate puzzles. From ancient Greece to the Arabian Nights, explore the rich tapestry of human history and mythology.

Can you decipher the clues and unveil the secrets of the past? Unearth hidden objects and untangle the mysteries that have captivated generations.

Console and mobile versions are coming soon, so stay tuned for more ways to enjoy the adventure.

Grab your magnifying glass and embark on this epic quest today! Don't miss out on the magic – get your copy now and let the adventure begin.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2304640
https://www.gog.com/en/game/hidden_through_time_2_myths_magic

#indiegames #steamgames #cutegame #hiddenobjectgame
